channel.title: Project Decimate v2 - 45+ online all times ll unique ll dicing ll active pking
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6BHrkrW.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.Lucidity614.org/]
[img]http://zigiscape.ucoz.com/Play_now_1.png[/img][/url]
- [url=http://Lucidity614.org/][B]Server
Homepage[/B][/url] -
- [url=http://Lucidity614.org][B]Server
Forums[/B][/url] -
-
[URL=http://"http://lucidity614.org/webclient.php"]
[B]Server Webclient[/B][/URL] -
- [url=http://www.Lucidity614.org][B]Vote 4
Reward[/B][/url] -
[b]- ABOUT THE OWNER -
[/b]
I am a very friendly active owner that tries
to make the server as enjoyable, and
continuously enjoyable as possible for my
players. I am also regularly trying to find, and fix
any bugs I come across, and think of new
things to add to the server. I will probably be adding updates every
week, and also fixing bugs or changing
little things to be more accurate daily.
I did not take someones released source, and
client and change the names of everything,
and add a shop or NPC or object here and
there like most servers out there. I strive to add quality content to the
server done by me the way I want it done,
and done right.
So join Project Decimate, and tell me if i'm
bullshitting you. ;)
[url=http://www.Lucidity614.org][img]http://zigiscape.ucoz.com/Play_now_1.png[/img][/url]
[B]CLIENT FEATURES:[/B]
[COLOR=red]• 634 Items, 602 NPCS, 633
Characters, and 602 Animations & GFX.
• All of the above with only a 45MB Cache
that downloads in less then minute and a
half on any connection!(Tested.)[/COLOR]
[B]SERVER FEATURES:[/B]
[color=red][B][I]PVM & PVP:
[/I][/B]
• Perfect clipped following/walking for
players & NPCs.
• Perfect clipped combat following for
players & NPCs.
• Perfect clipped projectiles for players &
NPCs.(Can't shoot arrows or cast magic
through objects. Finds a clear line of sight
then attacks.)
• Close to perfect PVP. Perfect attack
formulas + max hit formulas(Including
specials) + defense formulas. All modified &
tested by me.
• Close to perfect PVM. Can't stand on top
NPC or diagonal fight. Every NPC has correct
attack styles/emotes.
• Chance of a PvP item drop when killing
other players in the wilderness.
• Unique home in Slayer Tower with many
portals that take you places.
• All 4 god wars bosses, and minions to
defeat for godswords, and gear.
• 90% Kalphite Lair.(With rope requirement
to climb down the tunnel, and KQ with 2
forms with correct anims & gfx.)
• KBD, Dagannoth Kings, Chaos Elemental all
in one unique dungeon with revenants that
drop PvP items.
• Barrelchest boss that drops the
barrlechest anchor with 100% special attack.
• Tormented demons with all correct attacks.
• Avatar of Destruction, Creation, and
Decaying Avatar that drop chaotics.
• Corporal beast with correct attack, and
projectiles. Drop sigils, spirit shield, and
holy elixir.
• Wilderness ice monsters area with Ice
Demons, Ice Strykewyrms, and Frost Dragons.
• Many other unique custom dungeons with
monsters you probably never seen before on a
RSPS all with drops, and correct anims.
• Training spot for just ranged, and mage
that takes advantage of the clipping system.
• All trade screen, and dueling screen bugs
fixed. You don't lose any items offered if
you or other player exits the screen
somehow.
• All curses & normal prayers working
accurate to RS's forumla's.
• Vengeance working on both NPCS & players.
• Multi barrage that works on NPCS &
players.
• PvP point shops that requires kills to
unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks
a new item in the shop.
• Uncheatable PvP points system that logs
last killed IP, and your own IP so you can't
get points from your own host.
• All extreme potions added, and in shops,
but not too cheap. Also recover special
potion 100% accurate to RS's.
• All Godswords with correct special attacks
& effects.(E.G. SGS heals HP 1/2 of damage
dealt, and prayer 1/4 of damage dealt.)
• All PvP weapons with correct special
attacks & effects.(E.G. SWH drains opponents
defense by 1 + 30% of damage dealt.) -
• All dragon weapons with correct specials &
effects.
• All ranged weapons with correct special
attacks.
• Granite maul special working on NPCS &
players.
• Saradomin sword, Abyssal whip, and dragon
claws specials working 100%.
• Instant switching.(Right as you click on
the item it equips it without any delay at
all.)
[B][I]MINIGAMES:[/I]
[/B]
• Fun pk area where you don't lose any items
upon death.
• 100% Duel arena with all dupes, and bugs
fixed.
• Custom Champions Challenge mini-game
that's similar to RS's. Win Slayer points,
and exclusive gear.
• Custom Spirit warriors mini-game that you
can obtain spirit shields from, and other
good melee gear.
• Barrows mini-game to obtain barrows
equipment.
• Barbarian Assualt mini-game with 15 waves
of Penance monsters to defeat to obtain
Honour points.
• Pest control mini-game to obtain Void
knight equipment, and Void knight elite.
• One wave fight caves. Defeat the mighty
JAD for a fire cape.
[B][I]SKILLING:[/I]
[/B]
• Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All
monsters in the server are able to be
assigned as slayer tasks.
• Working herblore skill. You are able to
clean herbs, and also make extreme potions,
recover special, and super prayer potions.
• Working mining & smithing skills. Mine
ores with correct delays & rock
emptying/refilling.
• Working fishing & cooking skills. You can
fish all types of fish including rocktails,
and cooking them as well.
• Working agility skill with gnome agility
course with correct delays, and animations
with agility ticket rewards shop.
• Working firemaking skill integrated with
the clipping system, with global ashes
dropping after fire burns out.
• Working woodcutting skill with trees being
chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
• Working fletching skill with interfaces,
make longbows, short bows, arrows with
animations.
• Working crafting skill with interfaces,
and animations.
• Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at
home that give good amounts of cash.
- Working runecrafting skill with
multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.
• Working farming skill. Needs a lot of
work, but you can plant seeds, and pick
herbs.
• All EXP given by skills have been modified
by myself to a comfortable level. You should
be quite happy with it.
• Combat rate EXP is currently at 1500XP per
1 damage done.
• Many other features not listed.[/COLOR]
[b]- MEDIA -[/b]
[spoiler=Media]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/combatfollo
w.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/npcclipping
.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/projectiles
.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/multibarrag
e.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/cannon.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/maul.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/specs.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/switches.gi
f[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/champ1.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/champs.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/barb1.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/barb.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/spirit.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/pc.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/dice.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/curses.gif[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/agility2.pn
g[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/agility.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/revs.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/corp.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/avatar.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/kq1.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/pvp.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/weapons.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/barrows.png[/img]
[img]http://projectdecimate.com/media/pots.png[/img]
[/spoiler]
[IMG]http://s06.flagcounter.com/count/yEh/bg_FFFF
FF/txt_000000/border_CCCCCC/columns_8/maxfla
gs_49/viewers_0/labels_0/pageviews_0/flags_0
/[/img][/center]
